boofcv.alg.feature.detect.grid
Class DetectSquareCalibrationPoints

java.lang.Object
  boofcv.alg.feature.detect.grid.DetectSquareCalibrationPoints

public class DetectSquareCalibrationPoints
extends java.lang.Object

Detects square grid calibration targets from binary images. The output is a set of ordered calibration points with the number of rows and columns. Calibration points are in a row-major ordering. Processing steps:

  1. Morphological noise reduction
  2. Create blob clusters
  3. Detect rectangles
  4. Order rectangles and extract calibration points.
See comments inside of code for how false positive blobs are removed. Rotational orientation is not ensured and for some applications the orientation might need to be adjusted.

Author:
Peter Abeles

Constructor Detail

DetectSquareCalibrationPoints

public DetectSquareCalibrationPoints(int maxCombinations,
                                     int gridCols,
                                     int gridRows)
Parameters:
maxCombinations - Maximum number of combinations of squares it will try when looking for a target. Try 500.
gridCols - Number of squares wide the grid is. Target dependent.
gridRows - Number of squares tall the grid is. Target dependent.
Method Detail

process

public boolean process(ImageUInt8 thresholded)
Processes the image and detects calibration targets. If one is found then true is returned and calibration points are extracted.

Parameters:
thresholded - Binary image where potential grid squares are set to one.
Returns:
True if it was successful and false otherwise. If false call getMessage() for details.

getTargetQuadrilateral

public java.util.List<Point2D_F64> getTargetQuadrilateral()
Returns corner points in quadrilateral that bounds all the target points, approximately.
